spreads.name: Three Card Spread
spreads.description: A simple but powerful spread that can be used for past, present, future or situation, action, outcome.

positions.name: First Position
positions.description: Past / Situation - What led to the current situation

positions.name: Second Position
positions.description: Present / Action - What is currently happening or what action to take

positions.name: Third Position
positions.description: Future / Outcome - Potential outcome or future developments

spreads.name: Celtic Cross
spreads.description: A comprehensive 10-card spread that provides deep insight into a situation and its influences.

positions.name: The Present
positions.description: The current situation or question at hand

positions.name: The Challenge
positions.description: What crosses or challenges the situation

positions.name: The Foundation
positions.description: The basis of the situation, what lies beneath

positions.name: The Past
positions.description: Recent past influences that are fading

positions.name: The Self
positions.description: Your attitude and approach to the situation

positions.name: External Influences
positions.description: How others see you or influence the situation

positions.name: Final Outcome
positions.description: The ultimate resolution or final outcome

spreads.name: Relationship Spread
spreads.description: A 5-card spread focused on understanding relationship dynamics.

positions.name: Self
positions.description: Your role and feelings in the relationship
